hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT ISNULL(R.Year,0) AS Year, ISNULL(R.Number,0) AS Number, R.Object, Convert(varchar, R.IdResolution) AS Codice, RL.LogDate, Type='Resl', RL.PI,RL.PS,RL.PD,RL.PZ, PM = 0, R.AdoptionDate, IsHandled = 0 FROM Resolution R INNER JOIN ( SELECT RL.IdResolution, MAX(RL.LogDate) as LogDate, SUM(CASE RL.LogType WHEN 'RI' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS PI, SUM(CASE RL.LogType WHEN 'RS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS PS, SUM(CASE RL.LogType WHEN 'RL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS PD, SUM(CASE RL.LogType WHEN 'RZ' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS PZ FROM ResolutionLog AS RL WHERE RL.SystemUser = :SystemUser AND RL.LogDate >= :LogDateFrom AND RL.LogDate <= :LogDateTo GROUP BY RL.IdResolution ) AS RL ON R.IdResolution = RL.IdResolution ORDER BY RL.LogDate DESC
